posts.post_title: SOLD: Sovereign Sam Crawford throwing PSA 2.5...
posts.post_content:
For sale here is a Sovereign 350 card depicting "Wahoo" Sam Crawford of Detroit Tigers fame.  Please ignore Bobby.

$SOLD net to me, postpaid in the continental U.S. Tax free.  :o

[url]seablaster@yahoo.com[/url]

[url]https://www.collectorfocus.com/collection/seablaster[/url]

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/seablaster/t206/71817/crawford[/IMG]
I will take it. Thank you.
Damn, should have checked the site today sooner!
